title: Is Justin Bieber not the best of all time? - Quora

response.answer_text: Absolutely not. Consider, for example, Diana Krall, Michael Buble, Anne Murray, Celine Dion, Neil Young, Alanis Morissette, Avril Lavigne, Gordon Lightfoot, Leonard Cohen, even Shania Twain . They’re all much better than Bieber. Jeez, even Oscar Petewrson sang better.
Can’t say that because there are many other singers better than him. I am not saying he is bad but he is not the best as well.
